backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control mixin, extensive US geography and proposal types, and helpers for initializing empty data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Detailed architectural vision describing hierarchical installations, ICP mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Developer-focused deployment guide covering dfx configuration, upgrade workflow, and cycle management.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes on homepage redesign including updated hero image, contrast fixes, typography, spacing, and visual effects.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines Whisper's phased development plan from foundational architecture through single‑installation prototype to multi‑installation scaling with explicit goals and non‑goals.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry system for adding navigable destinations the Secretary assistant can route users to via options, keywords, or deep links.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Defines Whisper’s visual design principles, color palette, typography, and accessibility guidelines for consistent UI styling.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the Whisper frontend and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell handling navigation, Secretary assistant integration, and UI section visibility via registered destinations.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable component rendering an icon inside a styled circular container with size and variant options.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form component for creating a Whisper instance, handling geography selection, name validation, and proposal submission.
Controlled select component for choosing a county based on selected state, with loading and error handling.
Controlled select component for choosing a place within a county, supporting loading, empty, and error states.
Controlled select component for choosing a US state, handling loading, errors, and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing detailed proposal info with admin moderation actions for approving or rejecting.
Lists all proposals with loading and error states and opens a detail dialog for each entry.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Promotional card encouraging users to open the Secretary assistant with dismiss functionality.
Interactive chat widget for the Secretary assistant, handling messages, menu navigation, and option selection.
Creates and mounts the Secretary widget into a portal container for overlay rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor using identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance name availability and submit new creation proposals with geography metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces any value over a configurable delay to reduce rapid updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login flow, and status tracking.
Custom hook that syncs React state to localStorage with SSR safeguards and JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend interactions such as parent checks, proposal retrieval, and admin status checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages secretary-style chat state, including messages, menu visibility, and helper actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Maintains a registry of navigation destinations with keyword search and action execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update proposal status and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks for fetching US states, counties, and places with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography into readable strings and provides labels for hierarchy levels.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines navigation intent types, parses and creates deep links, provides secretary option metadata, and includes helpers to match keywords or select options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current frontend-only styling update scope, known issues, and feature requirements for theme and hero image changes.
